net.sf.tweety.logics.ml

Class AlchemyMlnReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
      • net.sf.tweety.logics.ml.AbstractMlnReasoner
        • net.sf.tweety.logics.ml.AlchemyMlnReasoner

  • public class AlchemyMlnReasoner
extends AbstractMlnReasoner
    This class implements a wrapper for Alchemy in order to reason with MLNs. Note: implementation inspired by AlchemyWrapper of KReator (http://kreator-ide.sourceforge.net)
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

      Creates a new AlchemyMlnReasoner for the given Markov logic network.

                          net.sf.tweety.logics.fol.syntax.FolSignature signature)
        Creates a new AlchemyMlnReasoner for the given Markov logic network.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - a Markov logic network.
        signature - another signature (if the probability distribution should be defined on that one (that one should subsume the signature of the Markov logic network)
